thread.title: ‘Criminal conglomerate’ anointed Palaniswami as Tamil Nadu CM, says Kamal Hassan - Mobile Site India TV News
thread.title_full: ‘Criminal conglomerate’ anointed Palaniswami as Tamil Nadu CM, says Kamal Hassan - Mobile Site India TV News

title: ‘Criminal conglomerate’ anointed Palaniswami as Tamil Nadu CM, says Kamal Hassan - Mobile Site India TV News

organizations.name: kamal hassan india tv politics desk new delhi

text:
‘Criminal conglomerate’ anointed Palaniswami as Tamil ‘Criminal conglomerate’ anointed Palaniswami as Tamil Nadu CM, says Kamal Hassan India TV Politics Desk New Delhi 19 Feb 2017, 13:03:25 SMS 
Veteran Tamil actor Kamal Hassan has refused to accept Palaniswami as Tamil Nadu CM by pointing out that he was anointed by the family of Sasikaala which is a "a criminal conglomerate". 
Refusing to accept the outcome of Palaniswami’s trust vote in Tamil Nadu Assembly, Kamal Hassan said told a news channel, "The emotion on streets denote something else.” 
Kamal Hassan pointed out that Palaniswami’s mentor Sasikala was convicted by the Supreme Court in the DA case. 
"What I am saying, it is the truth and it was reiterated by (the) Court. Even the late Chief Minister (Jayalalithaa) has been accused," Kamal Hassan said. 
"We need our assembly floor clean. Give elections to people and they will speak their mind," he added. When asked about the possibility of him joining politics, Kamal Hassan said that he was not fir for it. 
"I am very angry and you don't need angry politicians. You need politicians with great balance. Right now I am angry and so are the people," he said.
